text: 27 Jun 2025 The Buzziest Books of June | 2025 June is when the world feels wide open—warm nights, golden mornings, and stories that dare you to dream bigger. ✨ These books are perfect companions for the season: rich with discovery, alive with emotion, and unforgettable in their ambition. From buzzworthy debuts to gripping sagas, these are June’s must-reads. Designer and reluctant ghost whisperer Claudia Grant has moved to the picturesque small town of Drakes Bay to reopen her late uncle’s dress shop. To her surprise, Uncle Herman didn’t die of natural causes, and an even bigger surprise, his ghost has taken up residence in her shop. Buy on Amazon Nemesis 06 by E. R. Torre Release Date: May 18, 2025 At the dawn of World War II, a remote military base in the Arizona desert is scheduled for shutdown. The man in charge has vastly different ideas. In the present, a vacationing couple exploring a forgotten ghost town uncovers a brutal thing lost to time. This thing hunts its prey ruthlessly. It has found its new target. It will not be stopped. Buy on Amazon Delivered by James Mondesir Release Date: May 15, 2025 Jean Valeur is a straightlaced NYU graduate student who finds himself on the wrong side of the law after a night with friends goes horribly wrong. Freed during the Rikers Early Release Program, he finds himself in Covid-ravaged New York City where he must survive the challenges of a changed world, learn to forgive the friend who ruined his life and embrace an uncertain future. The eerie parallels to Poe’s tale make this investigation a real challenge for Detective Jericho. A second murder makes for a shocking ending to this book. ATF undercover legend David Ward is pulled into the darkness. A quick visit to relieve the monotony up there among the floating clouds. What could go wrong? Buy on Amazon The Girl Who Wouldn’t Die by Jeff Abugov Release Date: June 7, 2025 She’s of our time, but she doesn’t age. Our epic tale follows the immortal woman through many lifetimes—past, present, and future—her struggle to keep her secret; her remorse in leaving loved ones when it’s time to move on; and her hardships slipping into her next identity. Violence, sex, adventure, and romance abound, but one thing’s for sure…eternal youth ain’t all it’s cracked up to be. Heroes must rise to confront the growing threat, leading a desperate fight to turn the tide before the galaxy is consumed by darkness. 27 Jun 2025

The Buzziest Books of June | 2025

June is when the world feels wide open—warm nights, golden mornings, and stories that dare you to dream bigger. ✨ These books are perfect companions for the season: rich with discovery, alive with emotion, and unforgettable in their ambition. From buzzworthy debuts to gripping sagas, these are June’s must-reads.

Ghosts & Gowns (A Dress Designer Cozy Mystery Series Book 1)

Lucinda Race

Release Date: June 3, 2025

She didn’t want to talk to ghosts or investigate a murder. Designer and reluctant ghost whisperer Claudia Grant has moved to the picturesque small town of Drakes Bay to reopen her late uncle’s dress shop. To her surprise, Uncle Herman didn’t die of natural causes, and an even bigger surprise, his ghost has taken up residence in her shop.

Buy on Amazon

Nemesis 06

by E. R. Torre

Release Date: May 18, 2025

At the dawn of World War II, a remote military base in the Arizona desert is scheduled for shutdown. The man in charge has vastly different ideas. In the present, a vacationing couple exploring a forgotten ghost town uncovers a brutal thing lost to time. This thing hunts its prey ruthlessly. It has found its new target. It will not be stopped.

Buy on Amazon

Delivered

by James Mondesir

Release Date: May 15, 2025

Jean Valeur is a straightlaced NYU graduate student who finds himself on the wrong side of the law after a night with friends goes horribly wrong. Freed during the Rikers Early Release Program, he finds himself in Covid-ravaged New York City where he must survive the challenges of a changed world, learn to forgive the friend who ruined his life and embrace an uncertain future.

Buy on Amazon

Smuggler’s Rebellion: Dawn of Defiance (Wild Frontier Chronicles Book 1)

by Daniel P. Douglas

Release Date: May 29, 2025

A jaded smuggler. A princess with everything to fight for. And a soccer robot who kicks more than just balls. The fate of the galaxy rests in their unlikely hands.

Buy on Amazon

Cybersecurity Checklist for Business Owners

by William Clements

Release Date: May 20, 2025

Cybercriminals never rest—and small businesses are their preferred targets. Many business owners assume they’re too small to attract hackers or trust that their IT provider has everything covered. But assumptions like these put your business at severe risk.

Buy on Amazon

Murder on Morgue Street (The Detective Jericho Series Book 10)

by Walter Marks

Release Date: May 15, 2025

Edgar Allan Poe’s “The Murders in the Rue Morgue” is the first fictional detective novel. A community theater’s production of this story results in a real murder: the death of the lead actress. The eerie parallels to Poe’s tale make this investigation a real challenge for Detective Jericho. A second murder makes for a shocking ending to this book.

Buy on Amazon

Deep Orange Cover: The Allegiance

by Joel W. Barrows

Release Date: June 9, 2025

A weapons shipment is hijacked, the driver executed in a way that sends a message. A rolling gun battle between rival motorcycle gangs ensues, leaving carnage strewn across Interstate 35. When Allegiance MC President Sonny Baumer is sentenced, he gets more than he bargained for. ATF undercover legend David Ward is pulled into the darkness.

Buy on Amazon

Dodging Mr. Right (Hooked In Series Book 2)

by Anastasia Alexander

Release Date: May 21, 2025

Tiffany Woodland is focused on success—until a business trip to India with her boss’s nephew throws her plans into chaos, where she confronts mischievous monkeys, chaotic traffic, and her sister’s well-meaning interference with a love potion at exactly the wrong time.

Buy on Amazon

Archer’s Moon (Legends of Ansu Book 1)

by J.W. Webb

Release Date: June 10, 2025

Sorcery, vengeance, passion, and war! As a deity, Argonwui knows she can have it all. Watching the green world spinning below, she ventures down to explore and learn about the lesser beings dwelling amongst that swirling gas. A quick visit to relieve the monotony up there among the floating clouds. What could go wrong?

Buy on Amazon

The Girl Who Wouldn’t Die

by Jeff Abugov

Release Date: June 7, 2025

She’s of our time, but she doesn’t age. Our epic tale follows the immortal woman through many lifetimes—past, present, and future—her struggle to keep her secret; her remorse in leaving loved ones when it’s time to move on; and her hardships slipping into her next identity. Violence, sex, adventure, and romance abound, but one thing’s for sure…eternal youth ain’t all it’s cracked up to be.

Buy on Amazon

Darkness, Light, and Fire (The Life And Times Of Gunnery Sergeant Jackson Mason Book 2)

by Mark Jordan

Release Date: June 15, 2025

In “Darkness, Light, and Fire,” the galaxy faces an unprecedented threat as an ancient, dark, and menacing enemy threatens to launch a relentless invasion, shaking the foundations of the galactic community. Heroes must rise to confront the growing threat, leading a desperate fight to turn the tide before the galaxy is consumed by darkness.

Buy on Amazon

Salmon Swimming Upstream and Homebound

by Stephen Johnson

Release Date: May 23, 2025

“Salmon Swimming Upstream and Homebound” is a heartfelt, nostalgic memoir capturing the essence of growing up in rural America during the 1960s. The story reflects on childhood adventures, family traditions, and the rhythms of farm life in the Pacific Northwest, offering a glimpse into the joys, challenges, and transformative moments of youth.

Buy on Amazon

Messenger for the Dead (Mathieu James Thriller Book 2)

by Matthew Fults

Release Date: June 17, 2025

ADVANCE READERS AGREE: “An intense, riveting, gripping, raw read.” “Relentless.” “Well written, highly recommend.” “Feels like you’re in a movie.” Messenger for the Dead is the sequel to the award-winning The Scotland Project. Mathieu James leads an international manhunt for the world’s most-wanted terrorist. Vengeance belongs to the departed.

Buy on Amazon

Heartstrings and Helmets (Hearts in Hawthorne Book 1)

by Alexa Aston

Release Date: June 17, 2025

Hawthorne, Texas-where couples are drawn to their hometown’s slower pace, finding lasting love and happiness. A man who’s gained fortune and fame. A woman who’s known heartbreak and despair. A second chance for a couple who went their separate ways years ago. Will a second chance at finding lasting happiness be in store for West and Kelby?

Buy on Amazon

Under Caution

by Lori Zoss

Release Date: June 17, 2025

Daisy Kray, a fearless stock car driver, faces sabotage at the Tennessee 400 and a vengeful ex-driver bent on destroying her. With danger closing in and her relationship with rival Jackson Wyatt heating up, Daisy must outpace her enemies and confront the deadly risks that could cost her everything. Under Caution—thrills, passion, and survival.

Buy on Amazon

Editorial License

by Ellis Johnson M.D.

Release Date: June 17, 2025

The long journey back from tragedy follows no timeline, and the road is never a straight path. It winds its way through a vast wilderness between sanity and madness, and the border between the two is not always clear.

Buy on Amazon

Gralmar’s Staff (The Focus and the Whisper Book 2)

by Christopher D. Williamst

Release Date: June 9, 2025

In the magical world, Gralmar’s Staff is a legend. One of the most powerful Focai ever created, even a piece of it conveys power that anyone would fight to have. Now Meilianna has one. And a ruthless sorceress, backed by an army of mechanical beasts and dark magic, is hot on her trail.

Buy on Amazon

Begin Again: The Wild, Love, & Space Between

by D.F. Maddox

Release Date: June 8, 2025

Bjorn wakes alone in the wild, memories fractured. Something follows—echoing him. Em races to save him through Project Theseus, risking unleashing something far darker. Begin Again is a haunting thriller of love, consciousness, and what it means to rebuild a life.

Buy on Amazon

Billionaire’s Last Resort (Manhattan’s Most Eligible)

by Thea Roman

Release Date: April 16, 2025

When a gorgeous man walked into my family’s hotel, not only did he fix the plumbing, but he also intoxicated me. I was drawn to him like my hunkie romance magnet is drawn to my decades-old refrigerator. But now I know he’s the infamous resort mogul. He’s not getting his greedy developer hands on my grandmother’s inn. Nope, no way. Oh, but his grin…

Buy on Amazon

The Day I Left Leona (Heartache in the Southern Hills Book 6)

by Jenny Marie Bee

Release Date: June 9, 2025

A widow shares the juicy details of her first love and why it failed with her granddaughter. Kismet bestows a chance for two fairytale endings, if they can survive a headstrong grandma and a vengeful ex-girlfriend. Quirky mingles with timeless in this romance, sprinkled with elements of women’s fiction to prove that a true love story never ends.

Buy on Amazon

The Me I Left Behind (Tuckaway Bay Book 4)

by Madeleine Jaimes

Release Date: June 24, 2025

Maggie Oliver has everything—beautiful children, a lovely home, and financial security—but she’s losing herself. When she discovers her husband has a secret family in another country, her life starts to unravel. Then a family tragedy changes everything, and her path to finding herself takes an unexpected turn.

Buy on Amazon

Space Vault: The Seed Eclipse (Sci-Fi Galaxy series Book 2)

by Jeremy Clift

Release Date: June 16, 2025

Space Vault: The Seed Eclipse is the gripping second book in Jeremy Clift’s Sci-Fi Galaxy series. As Earth collapses, a mother must protect her bioengineered daughter—humanity’s last hope—from AIs, aliens, and corporations racing to control the future of life itself.

Buy on Amazon

From the Ashes

by Jonathan Walson

Release Date: May 6, 2025

From the Ashes is a compelling romantic suspense novel that intertwines love, mystery, and self-discovery against a backdrop of danger and secrets. At its heart, the story explores the resilience of the human spirit and the transformative power of love when it emerges from the most unexpected—and often painful—circumstances.

Buy on Amazon

Mastering Business Storytelling (The Business Storytelling Blueprint Book 1)

by Taty Fittipaldi

Release Date: June 24, 2025

Packed with insights from neuroscience, practical strategies, and real-world examples, this book is your ultimate guide to mastering the art of business storytelling. Whether you’re presenting to stakeholders, leading multicultural teams, or influencing key decisions, you’ll learn how to engage, persuade, and lead like never before.

Buy on Amazon
